changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION','SOURCE_FUNCTION') IS NULL ALTER TABLE FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION ADD SOURCE_FUNCTION AS CONVERT(NVARCHAR(1), CASE WHEN CONTAINS(PAYLOAD, N'description' THEN 'P' WHEN CONTAINS(PAYLOAD, N'taskRunId' THEN 'I' END )

rollback.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION','SOURCE_FUNCTION') IS NOT NULL ALTER TABLE FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION DROP COLUMN SOURCE_FUNCTION
